nodes.text: The Human male trader Saun Dann once claimed to have a brother while trying to prevent an Imperial technician from fighting with the Wookiee Mallatobuck. According to him, the brother also had a son in the Imperial Military.

The Star Wars Holiday Special is not clear as to whether Saun Dann is telling the truth about having a brother and a nephew, or simply making it up in an effort to distract the technician. Worth noting is that he tells several other tall tales to the Imperials while trying to distract them.
